channel.title: DynamicsCRM on David Triana
channel.description: Recent content in DynamicsCRM on David Triana

item.title: All you need to know when installing Dynamics CRM 2011
item.description: When dealing with installing the on premise version of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 you will find a couple documents on MSDN, Microsoft Dynamics CRM Planning Guide and Microsoft Dynamics CRM Installing Guide. I find those lacking a lot of detail with the real steps and requirement for the installation, however I found this excellent and very detailed technical step by step guide, with just one flaw, http://social.technet.microsoft.com/wiki/contents/articles/3176.how-to-install-microsoft-dynamics-crm-2011-en-us.aspx The flaw is when SQL Server is on another server and a TCP port other than the default and the Windows Firewall is on.
